    Methods

    protected

    • createOutputStream() — Create `php://output` stream
    • getStatusHeader() — Get the response header for a status code

    • __invoke() — Invoke the emitter as PSR-7 middleware
    • emit() — Emit the full HTTP response
    • emitBody() — Emit the HTTP body
